Verses: 1 isravel Siththeemile Thangiyirukkaiyil, Janangal Movaapin Kumaaraththigalode Vesiththanam Pannaththodanginaargal.
2 avargal Thangal Thevargalukku Itta Paligalai Virundhunnumpadi Janangalai Azhaiththaargal; Janangal Poi Pusiththu, Avargal Thevargalaip Panindhukkondaargal.
3 ippadi Isravelar Paagaalpeyoraip Patrikkondaargal; Adhanaal Isravelar Mel Karththarudaiya Kobam Moondadhu.

4 karththar Moseyai Nokki: Karththarudaiya Ukkiramaana Kobam Isravelai Vittu Neengumpadi Nee Janangalin Thalaivar Ellaaraiyum Koottikkondu, Appadi Seydhavargalai Sooriyanukku Edhire Karththarudaiya Sannidhaanaththil Thookkippodumpadi Sey Endraar.
5 appadiye Mose Isravelin Niyaayaadhipadhigalai Nokki: Neengal Avaravar Paagaalpeyoraip Patrikkonda Ungal Manidharaik Kondrupodungal Endraan.

6 appozhudhu Moseyum Isravel Puththiraraagiya Sabaiyaar Anaivarum Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalukku Munbaaga Azhudhukondu Nirkaiyil, Avargal Kangalukku Munbaaga Isravel Puththiraril Oruvan Oru Meedhiyaaniya Sthreeyaith Than Sagodhararidaththil Azhaiththukkonduvandhaan.
7 adhai Aasaariyanaagiya Aaronin Kumaaranaana Eleyaasaarin Magan Pinekaas Kandapodhu, Avan Naduchchabaiyilirundhu Ezhundhu, Oru Eettiyaith Than Kaiyile Pidiththu,

8 isravelanaagiya Andha Manidhan Vesiththanampannum Araiyile Avan Pinnaale Poi, Isravel Manidhanum Andha Sthreeyumaagiya Iruvarudaiya Vayitrilum Eetti Uruvippoga Avargalaik Kuththippottaan; Appozhudhu Isravel Puththiraril Undaana Vaadhai Nindrupoyitru.

11 naan En Erichchalil Isravel Puththirarai Nirmoolamaakkaadhapadikku, Aasaariyanaagiya Aaronin Kumaaranaana Eleyaasaarin Magan Pinekaas, En Nimiththam Avargal Naduvil Bakthivairaakkiyam Kaanbiththadhinaal, Isravel Puththirar Mel Undaana En Ukkiraththaith Thiruppinaan.
12 aagaiyaal, Idho, Avanukku En Samaadhaanaththin Udanpadikkaiyaik Kattalaiyidugiren.

13 avan Than Dhevanukkaaga Bakthivairaakkiyam Kaanbiththu, Isravel Puththirarukkaagap Paavanivarththi Seydhapadiyinaal, Avanukkum Avanukkup Pinbu Avan Sandhadhikkum Niththiya Aasaariya Pattaththirkuriya Udanpadikkai Undaayirukkum Endru Sol Endraar.
14 meedhiyaaniya Sthreeyode Kuththundu Seththa Isravel Manidhanudaiya Per Simri; Avan Salloovin Kumaaranum, Simiyoniyarin Thagappan Vamsaththil Oru Prabuvumaayirundhaan.
15 kuththunda Meedhiyaaniya Sthreeyin Per Kaspi, Aval Soorin Kumaaraththi, Avan Meedhiyaaniyarudaiya Thagappan Vamsaththaaraana Janangalukkuth Thalaivanaayirundhaan.

18 peyorin Sangadhiyilum Peyorin Nimiththam Vaadhaiyundaana Naalile Kuththunda Avargal Sagodhariyaagiya Kaspi Ennum Meedhiyaan Prabuvinudaiya Kumaaraththiyin Sangadhiyilum, Avargal Ungalukku Seydha Sarppanaigalinaal Ungalai Mosampokki Nerukkinaargale Endraar.
